title: Plus 1 and Lonely Canadian Girl looking for YOU
body:
Hai friends,
We need some people to league and chill with. 
Are you that person?
I think you are ;)
Have Discord and a personality. League skills will be judged.
ADD ME!
IGN: Whats Her Name

replies.body: well good thing i get 33 kills in "elo hell" while smurfing and solo carry :P {{sticker:slayer-pantheon-thumbs}}

Elo hell is not a joke...
{{sticker:slayer-jinx-unamused}}

> [{quoted}](name=Kirkyyy,realm=EUW,application-id=K6EGEal2,discussion-id=ZTEEW7Yd,comment-id=0003,timestamp=2016-02-24T01:54:05.198+0000)
>
> NA scurbs ^^

Hey! That's not very nice, sir.
its not a thing ha xD so it is
bronze scrubs arent allowed, it says GOOD league players D:
i dont have discord but i want to have someone i can duo with so i can climb out of the no warding elo aka bronze
